Notes: A rolling obstacle that moves on a set path. Once it reaches the end of its path, it will reappear at the path's start again.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: How fast the obstacle moves on the path. Default is 10.

Obj_arg1.Name: Appearance Delay
Obj_arg1.Description: The delay in frames before the actual obstacle will be generated. Default is 0.

Point_arg0.Name: Next Nerve
Point_arg0.Description: Specifies the next state to be used when the object arrives at this point.

Point_arg1.Name: Invalidate Shadow?
Point_arg1.Description: If set, its shadow will be invalidated. Otherwise, it will be validated.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that the rocks will move on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
